testcase.name: Create a new Vendor Bill
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed Given User is on odoo Purchases/Vendor Bills module.........................passed When User clicks on Create button...........................................passed And User fills out the form to create a new vendor bill.....................passed And User clicks on Add an item button.......................................passed And User enters "ice cream" into item name field and clicks Enter...........passed When User clicks on Save button.............................................passed Then "ice cream" appears in the created bill................................passed
